name: [rootDIRECTORY]
description: Uh oh! A virus has been detected and it's rapidly approaching your desktop! In this endless survival game, lead the corrupt microchips away from your system's root directory and dispose of them in the recycle bin to cleanse your desktop of the virus once and for all! If too many corrupt microchips reach the desktop, your system will malfunction -- in other words... GAME OVER.
